about_the_game:
Shape the Fate of the Neon River

The Neon River galaxy teeters on the brink of chaos. As a merchant in the Star of Reason’s Chamber of Commerce, you’ll navigate a dynamic universe of rival factions, unique races, and untold mysteries. Guided by the advanced AI Sophia, your journey will shape the galaxy’s future. Will you bring prosperity or let the stars descend into chaos?

Master Galactic Trade

Trade is your key to influence. Discover rare resources, track market trends, and make calculated deals to grow your reputation. Each transaction strengthens your position in a galaxy where commerce drives power and competition defines survival. Along the way, you might stumble upon unexpected ways to shape your surroundings.

A Living, AI-Driven World

Astrobuilder’s galaxy thrives with over 500 AI-driven NPCs. Each character has evolving stories, relationships, and behaviors shaped by their interactions with you and each other. Alliances form, grudges deepen, and choices ripple outward, ensuring every journey feels fresh and unpredictable.

Factions, Races, and Rivalries

The Neon River is a battleground for influence, where factions like the Kingdom, Empire, and others vie for control. As part of the Star of Reason’s Chamber of Commerce, you’ll interact with a galaxy of sentient races—Robots, Hammerhead Sharks, Striped Tigers, and more. Use diplomacy, strategy, or competition to navigate their ambitions and carve your own legacy.

Explore the Untamed Frontier

Venture into uncharted territories at the galaxy’s edge, where magnetic storms and hidden secrets await. Discover new trade routes, encounter legendary figures, and face unexpected dangers in the Neon River’s most remote regions. Sometimes, the discoveries you make might offer surprising ways to leave a lasting mark on these untamed worlds.

Rewrite History, Shape the Galaxy

Your actions don’t just affect your journey—they influence the galaxy itself. Change the fortunes of factions, alter the lives of AI-driven characters, and leave a legacy written across the stars. Every decision shapes the Neon River’s future in profound and unexpected ways.

From Merchant to Visionary

As a rising star in the Chamber of Commerce, your choices will determine the fate of the Neon River. Will you unite its factions, elevate your allies, or sow discord for your own gain? The galaxy’s destiny is yours to decide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-7400K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space

short_description: Astrobuilder is an AI-native space RPG where you play as a merchant navigating the Neon River Galaxy. Trade, explore, and shape the galaxy’s future as AI-driven NPCs evolve and react dynamically. Build alliances, uncover conspiracies, and forge your legacy in this living, cartoon-style universe.

English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
